name: The Tower (itch) (Thunder_Wood)
description:
Made for GMTK Game Jam 2020.

The Tower “The Tower” is a turn-based strategy game. As a player, you will control an imprisoned brave-man to get out of the control of Zeno, the owner of this tower. Use various items to avoid enemies or take them out while you keep going downstairs and eventually unravel the ultimate secret of the tower. Controls

Arrow Keys - Move

Space Key - Confirm

Escape key - Reset
